Offisionele naam: Loi Krathong [ citation needed ] (ลอยกระทง)
Observed deur: Thailand, Laos (as Boun That Luang ), Noord Malysië, Shan in Myanmar en Xishuangbanna in China,, Myanmar (as Tazaungdaing festival ), Sri Lanka (as Il Poya ), Kambodië (as Bon Om Touk )
Datum: Volvuldige maan van die 12de Thai maand
Verwanter tot: Tazaungdaing festival (in Myanmar), Il Poya (in Sri Lanka), Bon Om Touk (in Kambodië)
